participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Energetic and competitive, with a passion for sports and fitness.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is yellow. i workout four hours a day. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i'm a gold medalist olympian.

participant_2.name: Michael

participant_2.background: i love cats and have two cats. i've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. my favorite season is winter. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats.
